key_events.description: ISA Energia adjusted the schedule for its 21st debenture issuance, totaling up to R$ 3.785 billion, exclusively for professional investors, with collection of intentions on January 28, 2026.
JSCP (Juros Sobre Capital Pr√≥prio) was announced on January 29, 2026, with payment on February 25, 2026, value of R$0.25055300.
ISA Energia will disclose its Q4 2025 results on February 25, 2026, after market close, followed by a teleconference on February 26, 2026.
ISA Energia increased its 21st debenture issuance, which could reach up to R$3.86 billion.

risk_factors: Regulatory changes in the Brazilian electricity sector

investment_thesis.bull_case: ISAE3 offers voting rights and 80% tag-along rights. The stock has an estimated dividend yield of ~7%. Analyst ratings indicate a 'buy' trend. The revenue projection for ISA Energia ON is R$ 1.429B.
investment_thesis.bear_case: ISAE3 has lower liquidity than ISAE4. Revenue of R$ 1.07 Billion last quarter was below the estimate of R$ 1.13 Billion.

summary_markdown: ISA CTEEP (ISAE3) shows a bullish sentiment based on recent news. The company announced JSCP dividend payments of R$0.25055300 to be paid on February 25, 2026. The 21st debenture issuance was increased to R$3.86 billion. The stock price for ISAE3 on January 29, 2026, was R$ 35.19. Revenue projection for ISA Energia ON is R$ 1.429B. Analyst ratings indicate a 'buy' trend.
